hero.title: Practical Tools for Governance Innovation
hero.subtitle: Interactive instruments for systemic change
hero.description: From conflict resolution to decision-making frameworks, discover hands-on tools that transform how we govern together.

paradoxCanvas.title: Paradox Decision Canvas
paradoxCanvas.subtitle: Break through impossible conflicts
paradoxCanvas.description: An interactive tool for transforming polarized situations into breakthrough solutions. Map opposing positions, find shared aims, and design innovative third-way approaches that serve everyone's deeper interests.
features: Export to PDF or print format
paradoxCanvas.useCase: Perfect for: Community conflicts, organizational tensions, policy deadlocks, and any situation where different groups seem fundamentally opposed.

sciCycle.title: SCI Cycle Methodology
sciCycle.subtitle: Multi-perspective decision making with AI assistance
sciCycle.description: The Synthesis-Challenge-Integration Cycle: A rigorous methodology for leveraging diverse AI models to develop robust, holistic solutions to complex systemic problems.
sciCycle.useCase: Designed for: Policy development, organizational strategy, complex multi-stakeholder challenges, and any situation requiring comprehensive analysis.

culturalTranslationGuide.title: Cultural Translation Toolkit
culturalTranslationGuide.subtitle: Adapt governance frameworks across cultures
culturalTranslationGuide.description: A comprehensive guide and template set for respectfully adapting governance frameworks across diverse cultural contexts while maintaining cultural integrity and sovereignty.
culturalTranslationGuide.useCase: Essential for: Indigenous collaborations, international development, multicultural communities, and cross-cultural governance initiatives.
